reviewText: This was new in the package but the movies are without captions.
My son,s favorite actor: Liam Neeson. Love him and love these movies.
Great set of Liam Neeson's movies. Thoroughly enjoy watching this very gifted actor.
best deal to me,  Love this guy in films and getting three for the price of one is a great deal,  Will not be disappointed,
This group is a great purchase for serious comedy with Gun Shy, the other two movies were good,

and so are these three Liam Neeson videos.  All three are different and show what a good actor he and his co-stars are, in Gun Shy he shows a comic side that you rarely see him in.  In Before and After you not only watch Liam but you get to see Meryl Streep in a
film that made me question what would I do if I had to face the same situation.  The Good Mother was also a very good surprise.  Buy this 3 for 1 you won't be sorry.
only watched before and after so far. really enjoyed it

Thank God it played ok but one disc was loose and got knocked up and contained many scratches.
The important thing is, I was able to see the film without interruption.
I really was only looking for GunShy but got two more movies and the price was right.
I highly admire Neeson, the actor and the man!
Excellent movie pack and great gift for the Liam Neeson fan
